articles.title: Stock market today: Sensex, Nifty 50 end flat; mid, small cap indices outperform | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Stock market today: Sensex and Nifty 50 end flat after positive cues from US and Asian markets, and return of foreign portfolio investors. Financial and realty stocks advance while IT shares weigh on indices.
